Following a report by the Equine Welfare and Integrity Officer, stewards interviewed Palmer, alongside fellow trainers Francois Rohaut and Jean-Claude Rouget, and their respective employees.

Despite the incident, Palmer confirmed that Galileo Gold will continue racing next season and remain in training, highlighting the rarity and value of such horses.
